ygData.subject: Re: Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From:  To:  Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 11:59 AM Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: <jhenders@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 11:59 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith


> From: jhenders@...
>

(snip)
> Have you tried getting out of Oasis? I think that is one of the more
> boring places to hunt, at least if you're killing crocs. What level are
> you now? Have you tried any other places where pickup groups are
> relatively easy to find?

I am actively looking to get out of Oasis. I've pinged a couple other bards
at twentieth or near twentieth level to see what they were up to. Most were
either in KFC, or considering Unrest, a few were also in Lake Rathe hitting
the Aviak tower. When I was in Upper Guk last night I would have loved to
stay there but the only group of people I could find were part of a guild
out. They were nice, but they were not letting me in.

So I am open to any suggestions.

Bernwyn
